oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General Concepts in Transition Cow Management
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Stewart, Steven
Rapnicki, Paul
Fetrow, John
Lewis, James
Godden, Sandra
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: management
transition program
health
productivity
reproduction
profitability
implementation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Proper management of transition cows is critical for many reasons. The success or failure of the transition program impacts health, productivity, reproduction and profitability in the subsequent lactation. Proper management of transition cows requires a clear plan for both routine and less common situations, a means to implement the plan, and a method of monitoring the implementation of the plan and the results of the program.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2003; 96-99
